public class RetUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

User interface for indri retrieval.

Nested Class Summary
private  class RetUI.DocTableListener
          Listener on the retrieved documents table that enables populating the document text frame with the selection of a document.
private  class RetUI.QueryTreeListener
          Listener for the query tree to update highlighting when the query node selection changes.
private  class RetUI.UIQueryNode
          Adapter for QueryAnnotationNode for populating the query tree display.

removeIndex

public void removeIndex()
Remove the selected index from the list. Close and reopen the query environment with any remaining indexes.

Present a file chooser to select an index to open. Open the index in the query environment.

Present an input dialog to obtain a hostname and optional port number. Open the given server in the query environment.

Parameters:

Returns:
a DefaultMutableTreeNode for this query.
